section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that the Prophet (ï·º) used to pray in Al-Madinah combining two prayer. Joining Zuhr and 'Asr, and Maghrib and 'Isha', when there was no fear nor rain. It was said to him:"Why?" He said: "So that there would not be any hardship on his Ummah
